# Introduction



# Generate a Sample of Size N From a Known Distribution

```{r}
library(tgsify)

N <- 201 # parameters

generate_data <- function(N){ 
  # Hard coded standard normal distribution
  rnorm(N) 
}

data <- generate_data(N)
head(data)
```

# Estimate Distribution

```{r}
est <- function(data){
  mmean <- mean(data)
  msd <- sd(data)
  return(c(length(data), mmean, msd))
}
true.parameters %>% generate_data %>% est
```
